title: Earn new rewards when reaching mastery levels 8, 9 and 10.
body:
Hello and today I would like to discuss my ideas with the fellow League of Legends community. My idea is to receive extra rewards when earning Mastery's 8, 9 and 10. 

I understand that these goals do need to be tweaked a little so please, If you have any suggestions  leave a comment and please vote in the poll below. 

___________________________________________

**How to reach Mastery Level 8?**
> In order to reach Mastery Level 8, you must have the following requirements;

> **75,000** Mastery Points or more 
> **4 S/S+** Mastery Tokens
> **4500 Blue Essence -OR- 1 Champion Shard -OR- Permanent.**
  
> You must be Mastery Level 7 to advance to Mastery Level 8.


**Rewards for Mastery 8:**

> Earn new mastery badge emote, loading screen border flag, and announcement banner.
>
> **NEW: Earn an exclusive Mastery Icon for that champion.**

> (Note: This Icon cannot be bought with RP/BE.)

____________________________________________

**How to reach Mastery Level 9: **
> In order to reach Mastery Level 9, you must have the following requirements;

> **150,000** Mastery Points or more 
> **5 S/S+** Mastery Tokens
> ** 5100 Blue Essence -OR- 1 Champion Shard -OR- Permanent.**

> You must be Mastery Level 8 to advance to Mastery Level 9.

**Rewards for Mastery 9:**

> Earn new mastery badge emote, loading screen border flag, and announcement banner.
> 
> **NEW: Earn an exclusive Mastery Ward for that champion.**

> (Note: This Ward cannot be bought with RP/BE.)

____________________________________________

**How to reach Mastery Level 10:  (Max Level)**
> In order to reach Mastery Level 10, you must have the following requirements;

> **300,000** Mastery Points or more 
> **6 S+** Mastery Tokens (Note: Not S, only S+)
> **5700 Blue Essence -OR- 1 Champion Shard -OR- Permanent.**

> You must be Mastery Level 9 to advance to Mastery Level 10.

**Rewards for Mastery 10:**

> Earn new mastery badge emote, loading screen border flag, and announcement banner.
>  
> **NEW: Earn an exclusive Mastery Skin for that champion. **

> (Note: This Skin cannot be bought with RP.)

____________________________________________

**EDITS/UPDATES:**


>**March 13th, 2017:**
>
> **UPDATE:** I understand that this is A LOT of stuff. I did see some good suggestions like maybe only 1 reward at level 10 and you get skin + icon, which is way more reasonable. 
>
>Thanks for all the suggestions everyone! 
>
> ____________________________________________
>
>**May 18th, 2017:**
>
> **UPDATE:** Removed Chorma-Packs, moved Mastery Icon to Level 9. I agree that this was a "little" too much. For level 8 you just win the normal rewards; mastery badge emote, loading screen border flag, and announcement banner.
>
> **UPDATE 2:** Decreased mastery points on level 8 to 75,000,  level 9 to 150,000, level 10 to 300,000.
> ____________________________________________
>
>**February 19th, 2018:**
>
> **UPDATE: Added Exclusive Mastery Wards to Level 9 and switched Mastery Icons from Level 9 to Level 8.**
>
>**UPDATE 2:** Forgot to change BE values since IP was replaced with BE. New values are more corresponding with mastery's 6 and 7.
